item.title: Aft Cargo Heating System – Two Valve Installation

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided one valve (control or shutoff) is secured closed.

numlitem.para: Carriage of animals and perishables in associated cargo compartment is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to Aft Cargo Heat "INOP OFF". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Position the Temperature Control panel (P5) AFT CARGO HT switch OFF.
Advise dispatch that aft cargo compartment will be unheated.
Open and collar the P415 panel AFT CARGO HEAT PWR and the P7 panel CARGO HEAT AFT circuit breakers.

note.para: As an alternate method to deactivating circuit breakers, electrical connectors on the valves to be deactivated may be disconnected, capped, and stowed.

numlitem.para: TWO VALVE INSTALLATION: Deactivate control valve or override valve in the closed position.
Access for both valves is in right body landing gear wheel well area, inboard bulkhead. Override valve is against aft bulkhead.
Check that either the control or override valve is closed. Manually position one of the valves in the closed position using the manual operating handle on the valve position indicator.
